00037 namespace glm
00038 {
00039         template <>
00040         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool epsilonEqual
00041         (
00042                 float const & x,
00043                 float const & y,
00044                 float const & epsilon
00045         )
00046         {
00047                 return abs(x - y) < epsilon;
00048         }
00049

00051         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool epsilonEqual
00052         (
00053                 double const & x,
00054                 double const & y,
00055                 double const & epsilon
00056         )
00057         {
00058                 return abs(x - y) < epsilon;

00061         template <>
00062         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool epsilonNotEqual
00063         (
00064                 float const & x,
00065                 float const & y,
00066                 float const & epsilon
00067         )
00068         {
00069                 return abs(x - y) >= epsilon;
00070         }
00071

00076                 double const & y,
00077                 double const & epsilon

00079         {

00083         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00084         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vecType<bool, P> epsilonEqual
00085         (
00086                 vecType<T, P> const & x,
00087                 vecType<T, P> const & y,
00088                 T const & epsilon
00089         )
00090         {
00091                 return lessThan(abs(x - y), vecType<T, P>(epsilon));
00092         }
00093

00100         )

00105         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00106         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vecType<bool, P> epsilonNotEqual
00107         (
00108                 vecType<T, P> const & x,
00109                 vecType<T, P> const & y,
00110                 T const & epsilon
00111         )
00112         {
00113                 return greaterThanEqual(abs(x - y), vecType<T, P>(epsilon));
00114         }

00127         template <typename T, precision P>
00128         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<bool, P> epsilonEqual
00129         (
00130                 detail::tquat<T, P> const & x,
00131                 detail::tquat<T, P> const & y,
00132                 T const & epsilon
00133         )
00134         {
00135                 detail::tvec4<T, P> v(x.x - y.x, x.y - y.y, x.z - y.z, x.w - y.w);
00136                 return lessThan(abs(v), detail::tvec4<T, P>(epsilon));
00137         }
00138 
00139         template <typename T, precision P>
00140         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<bool, P> epsilonNotEqual
00141         (
00142                 detail::tquat<T, P> const & x,
00143                 detail::tquat<T, P> const & y,
00144                 T const & epsilon
00145         )
00146         {
00147                 detail::tvec4<T, P> v(x.x - y.x, x.y - y.y, x.z - y.z, x.w - y.w);
00148                 return greaterThanEqual(abs(v), detail::tvec4<T, P>(epsilon));
00149         }
